website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for the ultimate beach chair, this one has numerous features its competitors can't top — nearly everything you need in a chair specifically designed for the beach.
pros: Sturdy, lightweight, and attractive — we love that it's packed with features for beach-lovers: rear storage pouch, plushy cushion, attached cooler, cup holder, and even a handy towel bar
cons: The back frame bar can be felt when the chair is fully reclined
A bit challenging to collapse, but portable once it is folded

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Costco version
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: while the ad doesn't say it this is a costco warehouse version of the tommy Bahamas chair, so cheaper quality. NOT worth an original 87 as the price is inflated to make it look like you're getting a great deal at 47. These can be found at Costco for as little as 25 bucks. Cheap cheap cheap. If you want actual tommy Bahama quality go to the source. Or buy this version for less at Costco so if it does end up only lasting a season it won't hurt the wallet as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Beach Chair for larger size person
customer_reviews.text: This is a good chair, the carry handle on top and the backback setup are useful - the clip that holds it in the backback position kept coming loose so they might want to put better clips on it. Folding the chair after use is a little odd and you tend to get sand on yourself and the chair when trying to fold it. The size is good - 6ft / 240lbs and fit comfortably. The cup/can/bottle holders on these chairs are useless.

customer_reviews.title: Bars in all the wrong places.
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable with the bar under your hamstrings, the bar hitting your spine when fully relined, and the bar in your back when wearing it as a back pack. Terrible.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair. It's made well and is so easy and lightweight to carry. I love the side pockets and head pillow. The small cooler pocket in the back is very handy. My only issue with this chair is the bar across the seat in front. It can get uncomfortable and press into your thighs after sitting for a while. Wish they eliminated that bar across the front area of the seat and kept it just fabric.
customer_reviews.author: SMCT

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much I had to have my own
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Comfy. Love the reclining options. Also love that it has straps to carry it like a backpack. Super convenient for multiple scenarios (camping, beach, soccer games, etc.). First tried this at my dad's house, then loved it so much I went home and ordered my own on Amazon that same night!

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, one exception
customer_reviews.text: Convenient chair that holds everything you need. Easy to handle, light weight, and sturdy. My only complaint is that front bar can be uncomfortable depending on the positioning of your legs. I was able to look past it as I had my legs arched at a comfortable position. I would recommend this to anyone who doesnt want to carry a bunch of items to the beach. Plenty of storage and it frees up your hands, seemed like no-brainer purchase. On a side note, I needed one for my wife as well and ended up getting one from costco at a cheaper price. That being said, I do not regret purchasing it at a higher price as I really enjoyed it.

product_meta.title: Tommy Bahama Backpack Cooler Chair (Navy Blue)
product_meta.description: New for 2019! This Tommy Bahama Classic Backpack Beach Chair is one of the most popular chair on the beach today. It is what a beach goer always looked for in a beach chair. This chair is extremely light, featuring 5 reclining position including layflat position, easy to carry backpack style with lots of pockets including insulated cold storage. The chair is equipped with a built-in adjustable pillow, for peaceful relaxing comfort. The armrest is contour molded with a hanging cup holder and smart phones compartment. Available in several beautiful Tommy Bahama matching colors and designs. Enjoy the beach lifestyle.Product DetailsSuper Lightweight rust proof aluminum frame . Adjusts to 5 positions including layflat . Molded arms with cell phone holder & cup holder . Adjustable pillow. Padded backpack straps. Storage pouch & Insulated cooler pouch . Rubber carry handle . Folding towel bar . Durable 600 Denier polyester fabric . 300 lbs. weight capacity.
